# jameelinst.rpkg.theme

_jameelinst.rpkg.theme_ is an R package providing a _pkgdown_ template for R packages developed at the Jameel Institute.

## Installation

You can install the development version of jameelinst.rpkg.theme from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("jameel-institute/jameelinst.rpkg.theme")
```

## How to use

Add the following line to your R package's `DESCRIPTION` file to use this template for your _pkgdown_ website.

```
Config/Needs/website: jameel-institute/jameelinst.rpkg.theme
```
